#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm> 
using namespace std;
int search(int rp[],int x,int y)
{
  for(int i=1;i<y;i++)
    if(rp[i]==x)
      return 1;
    return 0;
}

int main()
{
  int t;
  cin >> t;
  while(t--)
  {
    long long a,b,mul=1;
    int rp[505]={0},k=1;
    cin >> a >> b;
    if(a==0)
     cout << "0" <<endl;
    else if(b==0)
      cout << "1" <<endl;
    else
    {
      for(int i=1;;i++)
      {
        if(k==1)
        {
          mul*=a;
          rp[k++]=mul%10;

        }
        else
        {
          mul*=a;
          if(!search(rp,mul%10,k))
          {
            rp[k++]=mul%10;
          }
          else
            break;
        }
      }
    }
    /*for(int i=1;i<k;i++)
       cout << rp[i] << " ";
       cout << endl;*/
    if(b%(k-1)==0)
    cout << rp[k-1] <<endl;
    else
      cout << rp[b%(k-1)] <<endl;
  

   }
  return 0;
}
